title: The definitive guide to learning Slovak
itunes:author: The Slovak Spectator
itunes:summary:
With complicated grammatical rules and verb forms, Slovak is a tough language for foreigners to learn. But there's hope! Listen to student Ali to find out which Slovak-language courses you can take in Bratislava to improve your language skills. 
 
Photo: TASR 
Presenter: Anna Fay
itunes:subtitle: With complicated grammatical rules and verb formsâ€¦
